Name: Locked In Mind
About the game: Overview : In Locked in Mind, you are the star of your own escape room adventure. Trapped in a mysterious and puzzling virtual world, you must use your wits and problem-solving skills to navigate through challenging obstacles and unlock the secrets of your surroundings. As you make your way through the game, you will encounter a variety of mind-bending puzzles that will test your intelligence and creativity. From cryptic clues and hidden codes to complex riddles and challenging brain teasers, you'll need to use all of your mental prowess to solve each puzzle and move on to the next. Unlike other escape room games, Locked in Mind has no time limit, so you can take your time and explore the virtual world at your own pace. This allows you to fully immerse yourself in the game and enjoy its challenges without the added pressure of a ticking clock. Whether you're a seasoned escape room enthusiast or a newcomer to the genre, you'll find plenty to love in Locked in Mind. So why wait? Start playing today and see if you have what it takes to unlock the secrets of the virtual world.
